title: Enhancing Practical Competencies in Instructional Design: Integrated Science Learning Environment via Collaborative Design-Based ePortfolios

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and possession of basic professional skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can integrate e-portfolios into science learning environments by applying the four stages of co-design (planning-design-implementation-evaluation).
Learners can complete interdisciplinary science problem-solving projects (medical/legal/technical) using e-portfolios in VR simulation environments.
Learners autonomously design content organization, assessment criteria, and role distribution for e-portfolios in collaboration with peers and instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
